## calculateTBN() function

Calculates the TBN matrix

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function calculateTBN(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope, worldPosition: PBShaderExp, uv: PBShaderExp, doubleSideLighting: boolean): PBShaderExp;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scope | [PBInsideFunctionScope](doc/markdown/./device.pbinsidefunctionscope.md) | Current shader scope |
|  worldPosition | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) | World position of current fragment |
|  uv | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) | Texture coordinate for normal map |
|  doubleSideLighting | boolean |  |

**Returns:**

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)

The calculated TBN matrix

## Remarks

This function computes the tangent frame for normal mapping without world normal
